Explanation: a rigid transformation (also called Euclidean transformation or Euclidean isometry) is a geometric transformation of a Euclidean space that preserves the Euclidean distance between every pair of points. The rigid transformations include rotations, translations, reflections, or their combination.
Notes: rotations 旋转
translations 平移
reflection 反射
rigid transformation does not change length of sizes, angles

Explanation: The discriminant is the part under the square root in the quadratic formula, b²-4ac.
Notes: A positive discriminant indicates that the quadratic has two distinct real number solutions.
A discriminant of zero indicates that the quadratic has a single real number solution.
A negative discriminant indicates that neither of the solutions are real numbers.

Explanation: ax^3+bx^2+cx+d 四项一元三次多项式, x^3 - 2y + z 三项三元三次多项式。count of Coefficient:项；count of variables(indeterminates): 元；max exponent: 次
Notes: a polynomial is the sum of various number of terms, each term is a coefficient times a variable raised to the power of a non negative integer.
when a polynomial only has one term, it is called a monomial: ax, (Pi)r^2, ... - 单项
when a polynomial has two terms, it is called a binomial: 2x + y, 3x^8 + 4x,... - 二项
when a polynomial has three terms, it is called a trinomial: 2x + y, 3x^8 + 4x,... - 三项
the degree of a polynomial is the highest degree of all the terms - 次
standard form - write the polynomio in the order of the degree, higest first - 10x^7 + 2x&2 + 9

Explanation: In geometry, a hypotenuse is the longest side of a right-angled triangle, the side opposite the right angle.

A central angle is the angle that forms when two radii meet at the center of a circle. A central angle (θ) measured in radians tells us how many times the radius fits into the arc.
内接的平面形状或固体是被另一几何形状或固体包围并“紧贴”在另一几何形状或固体内部的形状.
an angle bisector of a triangle will divide the opposite side into two segments that are proportional to the other two sides of the triangle.

在数学中，特别是在形式代数中，不确定性是被视为变量的符号，除了本身以外，它不代表其他任何东西，并且通常在多项式和形式幂级数等对象中用作占位符。尤其是： 它没有指定问题的常数或参数。这不是一个可以解决的未知数。它不是指定函数参数的变量，也不是求和或积分的变量。它不是任何类型的绑定变量。它只是一个完全正式使用的符号。

In probability theory and statistics, the marginal distribution of a subset of a collection of random variables is the probability distribution of the variables contained in the subset. It gives the probabilities of various values of the variables in the subset without reference to the values of the other variables.

A conditional distribution is a probability distribution for a sub-population. In other words, it shows the probability that a randomly selected item in a sub-population has a characteristic you're interested in.
Notes: The conventions is in percentage, not numbers
